description: Variation of condition 3 of planning permission dated 13th August 2019 (RN 19/04616/FULL) for the Excavation of two sub-basement levels and associated internal and external alterations all in connection with the use of the building as a hotel, including restaurant at ground and lower ground floor levels.  Creation of balconies at fifth floor level and installation of air conditioning units at sixth floor level. NAMELY to vary the wording of condition 3 a pre- commencement condition, to enable works to commence to implement the permission but still requiring details to be approved ( as part of the Councils Code of Construction ) prior to any basement excavation works being undertaken.   Application made under S73 of the Act
